name: William Mathison Bennett
bio: When William Mathison Bennett was born on 2 May 1829, in Butler, Choctaw, Alabama, United States, his father, Thomas B. Bennett, was 26 and his mother, Prudence Shipp, was 18. He had at least 3 sons and 2 daughters with Lavica Ann "Vicie" Curlee. He lived in Butler, Alabama, United States in 1850.
